name: Please Go Straight
description:
You wake up naked in an empty room, not remembering who you are and how did you get here. A voice from the speakers says that you are a participant in some Bromston experiment and offers you — when you are ready — to open the door next to you. What are hiding these long cold corridors? Only you can find it out.

Just follow the instructions.

T H E   G A M E   I S   W A T C H I N G

Music by ZOLT
